law.catch_line: The Commissioner may deny an application if the applicant or any current owner, director, officer, m...
law.text:
The Commissioner may deny an application if the applicant or any current owner, director, officer, member, partner, employee, agent, or spouse of the applicant:
Has had a license revoked under this subtitle;
Was responsible for any act or omission that caused the revocation under this subtitle of the license of any person; or
Was convicted of violating any provision of this subtitle or of any other law that regulates agreements.
